About Me

Hi, I'm Krishna - a Full-Stack Developer and Graphic Designer based in The Netherlands. With a unique background that bridges technical development and creative design, I specialize in creating digital experiences that are both functionally robust and visually stunning.

My journey began in graphic design, where I developed a keen eye for aesthetics, typography, and user experience. This foundation naturally evolved into web development, where I now combine these skills to build applications that not only work flawlessly but also delight users.

I believe that great digital products require equal parts technical precision and artistic vision. Whether I'm architecting a scalable backend system or crafting a pixel-perfect interface, my goal is always the same: to create solutions that blend code, art, and culture seamlessly.

What I Do
